data.title: BrickJournal #4
data.meta_description: BrickJournal, the ultimate resource for LEGO enthusiasts of all ages, is produced with the cooperation of the LEGO Group, and showcases all aspects...
data.text: BrickJournal, the ultimate resource for LEGO enthusiasts of all ages, is produced with the cooperation of the LEGO Group, and showcases all aspects of the LEGO Community, including events, people, and models, with contributions and how-to articles by top builders worldwide, new product intros, and more! FULL-COLOR issue #4 features interviews with top LEGO builders including Breann Sledge (Bionicle builder), Event Reports from LEGO gatherings like BrickFair (Washington, DC) and Brickcon (Seattle, Washington), plus reports on new MINDSTORMS projects, step-by-step building instructions and techniques for all skill levels, new set reviews, and editor JOE MENO shows how to build a working robotic LEGO Wall-E! Keep up with whatâ€™s happening in the LEGO Community with BrickJournal!
